div.div:
While school is closed, please use the following numbers to contact the school:
District: (716) 249-4997
Elementary: (314) 635-8965
Middle School: (716) 249-4687
These number will reach the appropriate secretary.

a.title: Region 8 Information Hub
a.div:
The Region 8 ESC staff has been working diligently over the past several days to develop a google site, the Region 8 COVID-19 Information Hub, to share with each district in Region 8 and other Regional Service Centers across the state. The site is meant to provide teachers and parents resources to support student learning. Core content academic, special education, school finance, and several other areas have been addressed with some fantastic resources.
Of course, this is a fluid site and will be updated on a regular basis. Our staff is continually researching ways to better support teachers, parents and students in this unprecedented time. As additional resources are developed by Region 8 or the other ESCs in the state, they will be added to the site. It is our hope that your district will find the tools and resources included on this site useful as your district provides instructional support to your community. We have provided a menu on the left side of the site has numerous resources across various areas.
Please click this block for more information.

div.span: TxConnect is Changing to Parent Portal Live

div.div: Red Lick ISD is please to announce the release of Ascender's parent Portal. If you had an existing account in txConnect, don't worry, just enjoy the new application as your existing username and password are still valid. Parents, the email address associated with your account must be on file with the office to allow you to continue to utilize the email/text alert feature in Parent Portal. Please call the school office and give them the email address associated with your Parent Portal account.

div.div: The mission of the Red Lick ISD is to provide student with an enthusiastic learning experience that is exceptional; to embrace the diversity of our students' learning abilities; to inspire optimism in all students so they may realize their full potential; to be proactive in providing teachers with current technology and training; and to be relentless in the pursuit of these principles for the benefit of our students.

p.span: Red Lick Independent School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
